#summary API reference for onLowMemory
#labels Phase-Implementation

= onLowMemory =

Called when the device has encountered low memory and trying to free the memory for the device. It is recommended to implement this function to free the memory at on low memory as much as possible.

{{{
function onLowMemory() {
  print("onLowMemory: too many sprites");
  // free your memory as much as possible
}
}}}
